thread.title: Suspect covered in black ink told police 'I am the law' | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Suspect covered in black ink told police 'I am the law' | Daily Mail Online

author: Snejana Farberov For Dailymail.Com
title: Suspect covered in black ink told police 'I am the law' | Daily Mail Online
text: Don't do drugs! Mugshot shows man covered in black ink who told police 'I am the law' when he was arrested with a meth pipe and wearing a women's tank top Joseph Augustini, 25, has been charged with non-alcohol public intoxication and possession of drug paraphernalia Augustini was arrested in Denton, Texas, Monday after being spotted darting in and out of traffic Body camera footage shows Augustini with black ink coating his face and a painted spider web on his chest and arms In the video, the seemingly deranged man repeatedly tells officers, 'I am the law' and 'I know the law' He also told cops to put down their guns as it 'wasn't a fair fight' Published: 18:58 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 22:27 GMT, 22 February 2017 85 shares
